data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Kullu, Himachal Pradesh, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kullu, Himachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Kullu.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 427,770, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 4,817 believers in Kullu against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Jesus, I pray that all the Ad Dharmi people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Ad Dharmi people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Ad Dharmi people is yours.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Kullu, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Kullu, Himachal Pradesh, India that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kullu, Himachal Pradesh, India has a population of 437,900.

We estimate Kullu has 4,817 people who might know Jesus, 5,313 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 427,770 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Kullu, Himachal Pradesh, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

location.name: Kullu
